roleset.name: default, to recall

example.name: remember-v: remember a nominal
example.text: In an invention that drives Verdi purists bananas , Violetta lies dying in bed during the prelude , rising deliriously when then she remembers the great parties she used to throw .

propbank.arg: the great parties she used to throw

example.name: remember-v: remember a sentence
example.text: The executive recalls Mr. Corry whispering to him and others , `` Remember , this was Dave 's deal . ''

example.name: remember-v: with attribute
example.text: `` A lot of people are remembering a vote for representation as a vote against Fred Smith , '' says J.X. Gollich , a Tiger - turned - Federal pilot and union activist .

propbank.arg: as a vote against Fred Smith

example.name: rememberance-n: arg 1 only
example.text: Remembrance of the 75th Anniversary of the Armenian Genocide of 1915 - 1923 , '' suffered at the hands of the warring Ottoman Empire

propbank.arg: of the 75th Anniversary of the Armenian Genocide of 1915 - 1923 , '' suffered at the hands of the warring Ottoman Empire

example.name: rememberance-n: args 0 and 1
example.text: To show their remembrance of Canada 's Veterans

example.name: rememberance-n: Everything but attribute (as phrase modifies envisioning)
example.text: Time and again , he envisions Eliot 's return to Dante -- his creative remembering of Dante 's struggles -- as a gesture that precipitated renewal and transformation ...

roleset.note: REMEMBER-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus, automatic expansion via verbnet. Member of Vncls characterize-29.2-1-1, consider-29.9-1-1-1. Checked by Julia, 10/2010. (from remember.01-v)
REMEMBRANCE-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to remember.01. VN classes characterize-29.2-1-1 and consider-29.9-1-1-1. Framed by Katie. (from remembrance.01-n)
REMEMBERING-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry remember.01, corresponds to Vncls characterize-29.2-1-1, consider-29.9-1-1-1. Framed by Claire. (from remembering.01-n)
Attribute not seen in data, but seems possible. (from remembering.01-n)
